lines.text:
[Jane has come off stage]
Fantastic! Bravo! I haven't seen better in Las Vegas.
It's a way to make a living.
You look equally good undressed or dressed.

[exposing what's under her costume]
How about neither?
Well, how about a little drink?
I hate the smell of garlic!
But Mr Forrester, I'm a married woman.
At least married women know what they want.
How cynical - for one so young.
